committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to make Thomas Jefferson's birthday a legal public holiday.

summary.text: Makes Thomas Jefferson's birthday a legal public holiday to be celebrated on the second Monday in April.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to make Thomas Jefferson's birthday a legal public holiday.
